summary.para: [DEPRECATED] Turns on text based logging for debugging purposes. The logs will be written to the directory specified in . It is equivalent to setting a configuration with UsePlaintext set to true on Database.Log.File.Config

This will override binary logging. It is not recommended to use this method anymore, but to use Database.Log.Console to get information to the console, or Database.Log.Custom to set up custom logging logic
